TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit Parallel extends System.Object
public ref class Parallel abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供对并行循环和区域的支持。

span.span: Provides support for parallel loops and regions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了基于库的数据并行替换常见操作，如 for 循环、 每个循环，和执行的一组语句。The class provides library-based data parallel replacements for common operations such as for loops, for each loops, and execution of a set of statements. ## Examples 此示例演示几种方法实现并行循环使用多个语言构造。This example demonstrates several approaches to implementing a parallel loop using multiple language constructs. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel#07](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallel/cs/parallelintro.cs#07)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel#07](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallel/vb/parallelintro.vb#07)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

summary.span: 执行 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）循环，其中可能会并行运行迭代。

span.span: Executes a ( in Visual Basic) loop in which iterations may run in parallel.

summary.span: 执行 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）循环，其中可能会并行运行迭代，而且可以监视和操作循环的状态。

span.span: Executes a ( in Visual Basic) loop in which iterations may run in parallel and the state of the loop can be monitored and manipulated.

returns.span: 包含有关已完成的循环部分的信息的结构。

span.span: A structure that contains information about which portion of the loop completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `body`委托会调用一次迭代范围中每个值 (`fromInclusive`， `toExclusive`)。The `body` delegate is invoked once for each value in the iteration range (`fromInclusive`, `toExclusive`). 它提供两个自变量：It is provided with two arguments: - 表示迭代次数的值。An value that represents the iteration count. - A可以用于过早地中断循环的实例。A instance that can be used to break out of the loop prematurely. 由编译器创建对象; 它不能在用户代码中实例化。The object is created by the compiler; it cannot be instantiated in user code. 调用方法将通知`for`后当前的迭代无需执行的操作。Calling the method informs the `for` operation that iterations after the current one don't have to execute. 但是，早于当前的所有迭代一个仍都将需要如果它们尚未执行。However, all iterations before the current one will still have to be executed if they haven't already. 因此，调用类似于使用中的传统的中断操作`for`中一种语言循环像 C# 中，但它不是理想的替代： 例如，是没有保证的迭代后当前的迭代将明确不执行。Therefore, calling is similar to using a break operation within a conventional `for` loop in a language like C#, but it is not a perfect substitute: For example, there is no guarantee that iterations after the current one will definitely not execute. 执行之前当前不是必需的所有迭代，如果使用方法而不是使用。If executing all iterations before the current one is not necessary, use the method instead of using . 调用通知`for`循环，它可能会放弃所有剩余迭代，而不考虑是否它们之前或之后当前迭代中，因为所有必需的工作将已完成。Calling informs the `for` loop that it may abandon all remaining iterations, regardless of whether they're before or after the current iteration, because all required work will have already been completed. 但是，如与，不没有有关哪个其他迭代将不执行任何保证。However, as with , there are no guarantees regarding which other iterations will not execute. 如果循环已提前结束返回结构将包含有关循环的完成的相关信息。If a loop is ended prematurely, the structure that is returned will contain relevant information about the loop's completion. 如果`fromInclusive`大于或等于`toExclusive`，该方法将立即返回而不执行任何迭代。If `fromInclusive` is greater than or equal to `toExclusive`, the method returns immediately without performing any iterations. ## Examples 下面的示例以并行方式执行最多 100 个循环迭代。The following example executes up to 100 iterations of a loop in parallel. 为从 1 到 1000 毫秒的随机间隔暂停每次迭代。Each iteration pauses for a random interval from 1 to 1,000 milliseconds. 随机生成的值确定的循环的迭代上调用方法。A randomly generated value determines on which iteration of the loop the method is called. 如示例所示，其索引大于任何迭代输出在调用后的属性值 start方法。As the output from the example shows, no iterations whose index is greater than the property value start after the call to the method. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/cs/break1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.ParallelLoopState#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallelloopstate/vb/break1.vb#2)] 因为的循环迭代仍可能会执行时方法被调用时，每个迭代调用属性检查是否已调用另一个迭代方法。Because iterations of the loop are still likely to be executing when the method is called, each iteration calls the property to check whether another iteration has called the method. 如果属性值是`true`，迭代检查的值属性，如果它大于当前迭代索引值，将立即返回。If the property value is `true`, the iteration checks the value of the property and, if it is greater than the current iteration's index value, returns immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支持 64 位索引。Supports 64-bit indexes. `body`委托会调用一次迭代范围中每个值 (`fromInclusive`， `toExclusive`)。The `body` delegate is invoked once for each value in the iteration range (`fromInclusive`, `toExclusive`). 它提供的迭代计数 () 作为参数。It is provided with the iteration count () as a parameter. 如果`fromInclusive`大于或等于`toExclusive`，则该方法立即返回而不执行任何迭代。If `fromInclusive` is greater than or equal to `toExclusive`, then the method returns immediately without performing any iterations. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用若要指定自定义任务计划程序：The following example shows how to use to specify a custom task scheduler: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel#06](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallel/cs/parallelforwithscheduler.cs#06)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel#06](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.tasks.parallel/vb/parallelforwithscheduler.vb#06)]

summary.span: 执行具有线程本地数据的 （在 Visual Basic 中为 ）循环，其中可能会并行运行迭代，而且可以监视和操作循环的状态。

span.span: Executes a ( in Visual Basic) loop with thread-local data in which iterations may run in parallel, and the state of the loop can be monitored and manipulated.

returns.span: 包含有关已完成的循环部分的信息的结构。

span.span: A structure that contains information about which portion of the loop completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `body`委托会调用一次迭代范围中每个值 (`fromInclusive`， `toExclusive`)。The `body` delegate is invoked once for each value in the iteration range (`fromInclusive`, `toExclusive`). 它提供以下参数： 迭代次数 ()、 一个可能用于提前，中断循环的实例，并可能在同一线程执行的迭代之间共享的某些本地状态。It is provided with the following parameters: the iteration count (), a instance that may be used to break out of the loop prematurely, and some local state that may be shared amongst iterations that execute on the same thread. `localInit`参与循环的执行，并为每个这些任务中返回的初始本地状态的每个任务一次调用委托。The `localInit` delegate is invoked once for each task that participates in the loop's execution and returns the initial local state for each of those tasks. 这些初始状态传递到第一个`body`上每个任务的调用。These initial states are passed to the first `body` invocations on each task. 然后，每个后续的正文调用返回传递到下一步的正文调用一个可能已修改值。Then, every subsequent body invocation returns a possibly modified state value that is passed to the next body invocation. 最后，在每个任务的最后一个正文调用返回传递到的州值`localFinally`委托。Finally, the last body invocation on each task returns a state value that is passed to the `localFinally` delegate. `localFinally`委托会调用一次每个任务以对每个任务的本地状态执行一个最终操作。The `localFinally` delegate is invoked once per task to perform a final action on each task's local state. 此委托可能会并行调用多个任务;因此，你必须同步对任何共享的变量的访问。This delegate might be invoked concurrently on multiple tasks; therefore, you must synchronize access to any shared variables. 方法可以作为现有任务完成其执行生存期内使用多于线程数更多的任务，并替换为新的任务。The method may use more tasks than threads over the lifetime of its execution, as existing tasks complete and are replaced by new tasks. 这样，基础对象有机会添加、 更改或删除服务循环的线程。This gives the underlying object the chance to add, change, or remove threads that service the loop. 如果`fromInclusive`大于或等于`toExclusive`，则该方法立即返回而不执行任何迭代。If `fromInclusive` is greater than or equal to `toExclusive`, then the method returns immediately without performing any iterations. 使用此方法的示例，请参阅[如何： 编写具有线程局部变量的 Parallel.For 循环](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-write-a-parallel-for-loop-with-thread-local-variables.md)。For an example that uses this method, see [How to: Write a Parallel.For Loop with Thread-Local Variables](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-write-a-parallel-for-loop-with-thread-local-variables.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于你想要重写默认分区方案的方案提供了此重载。This overload is provided for scenarios where you want to override the default partitioning scheme. 例如，小型循环体可能受益于分区范围。For example, small loop bodies might benefit from partitioning the range. 方法需要自定义分区程序来支持动态分区。The method expects custom partitioners to support dynamic partitioning. 有关详细信息，请参阅[PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)和[如何： 实现动态分区](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-implement-dynamic-partitions.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md) and [How to: Implement Dynamic Partitions](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-implement-dynamic-partitions.md). `localInit`参与循环的执行，并为每个这些任务中返回的初始本地状态的每个任务一次调用委托。The `localInit` delegate is invoked once for each task that participates in the loop's execution and returns the initial local state for each of those tasks. 这些初始状态传递到第一个`body`上每个任务的调用。These initial states are passed to the first `body` invocations on each task. 然后，每个后续的正文调用返回传递到下一步的正文调用一个可能已修改值。Then, every subsequent body invocation returns a possibly modified state value that is passed to the next body invocation. 最后，在每个任务的最后一个正文调用返回传递到的州值`localFinally`委托。Finally, the last body invocation on each task returns a state value that is passed to the `localFinally` delegate. `localFinally`委托会调用一次每个任务以对每个任务的本地状态执行一个最终操作。The `localFinally` delegate is invoked once per task to perform a final action on each task's local state. 此委托可能会并行调用多个任务;因此，你必须同步对任何共享的变量的访问。This delegate might be invoked concurrently on multiple tasks; therefore, you must synchronize access to any shared variables. 方法可以作为现有任务完成其执行生存期内使用多于线程数更多的任务，并替换为新的任务。The method may use more tasks than threads over the lifetime of its execution, as existing tasks complete and are replaced by new tasks. 这样，基础对象有机会添加、 更改或删除服务循环的线程。This gives the underlying object the chance to add, change, or remove threads that service the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `body`委托中每个元素调用一次`source`可枚举。The `body` delegate is invoked once for each element in the `source` enumerable. 它提供以下参数： 当前元素，实例可能用于过早地中断循环、 当前元素的索引 ()，可能需要执行的迭代之间共享某些本地状态在同一线程。It is provided with the following parameters: the current element, a instance that may be used to break out of the loop prematurely, the current element's index (), and some local state that may be shared amongst iterations that execute on the same thread. `localInit`参与循环的执行，并为每个这些任务中返回的初始本地状态的每个任务一次调用委托。The `localInit` delegate is invoked once for each task that participates in the loop's execution and returns the initial local state for each of those tasks. 这些初始状态传递到第一个`body`上每个任务的调用。These initial states are passed to the first `body` invocations on each task. 然后，每个后续的正文调用返回传递到下一步的正文调用一个可能已修改值。Then, every subsequent body invocation returns a possibly modified state value that is passed to the next body invocation. 最后，在每个任务的最后一个正文调用返回传递到的州值`localFinally`委托。Finally, the last body invocation on each task returns a state value that is passed to the `localFinally` delegate. `localFinally`委托会调用一次每个任务以对每个任务的本地状态执行一个最终操作。The `localFinally` delegate is invoked once per task to perform a final action on each task’s local state. 此委托可能会并行调用多个任务;因此，你必须同步对任何共享的变量的访问。This delegate might be invoked concurrently on multiple tasks; therefore, you must synchronize access to any shared variables. 方法可以作为现有任务完成其执行生存期内使用多于线程数更多的任务，并替换为新的任务。The method may use more tasks than threads over the lifetime of its execution, as existing tasks complete and are replaced by new tasks. 这样，基础对象有机会添加、 更改或删除服务循环的线程。This gives the underlying object the chance to add, change, or remove threads that service the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于你想要重写默认分区方案的方案提供了此重载。This overload is provided for scenarios where you want to override the default partitioning scheme. 例如，小型循环体可能受益于分区范围。For example, small loop bodies might benefit from partitioning the range. 方法需要自定义分区程序来支持动态分区。The method expects custom partitioners to support dynamic partitioning. 有关详细信息，请参阅[PLINQ 和 TPL 的自定义分区程序](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md)和[如何： 实现动态分区](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-implement-dynamic-partitions.md)。For more information, see [Custom Partitioners for PLINQ and TPL](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/custom-partitioners-for-plinq-and-tpl.md) and [How to: Implement Dynamic Partitions](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-implement-dynamic-partitions.md). `localInit`参与循环的执行，并为每个这些任务中返回的初始本地状态的每个任务一次调用委托。The `localInit` delegate is invoked once for each task that participates in the loop's execution and returns the initial local state for each of those tasks. 这些初始状态传递到第一个`body`上每个任务的调用。These initial states are passed to the first `body` invocations on each task. 然后，每个后续的正文调用返回传递到下一步的正文调用一个可能已修改值。Then, every subsequent body invocation returns a possibly modified state value that is passed to the next body invocation. 最后，在每个线程上的最后一个正文调用返回传递到的州值`localFinally`委托。Finally, the last body invocation on each thread returns a state value that is passed to the `localFinally` delegate. `localFinally`委托会调用一次每个任务以对每个任务的本地状态执行一个最终操作。The `localFinally` delegate is invoked once per task to perform a final action on each task’s local state. 此委托可能会并行调用多个任务;因此，你必须同步对任何共享的变量的访问。This delegate might be invoked concurrently on multiple tasks; therefore, you must synchronize access to any shared variables. 方法可以作为现有任务完成其执行生存期内使用多于线程数更多的任务，并替换为新的任务。The method may use more tasks than threads over the lifetime of its execution, as existing tasks complete and are replaced by new tasks. 这样，基础对象有机会添加、 更改或删除服务循环的线程。This gives the underlying object the chance to add, change, or remove threads that service the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `body`委托中每个元素调用一次`source`可枚举。The `body` delegate is invoked once for each element in the `source` enumerable. 它提供以下参数： 当前元素，实例可能用于过早地中断循环、 当前元素的索引 ()，可能需要执行的迭代之间共享某些本地状态在同一线程。It is provided with the following parameters: the current element, a instance that may be used to break out of the loop prematurely, the current element's index (), and some local state that may be shared amongst iterations that execute on the same thread. `localInit`参与循环的执行，并为每个这些任务中返回的初始本地状态的每个任务一次调用委托。The `localInit` delegate is invoked once for each task that participates in the loop's execution and returns the initial local state for each of those tasks. 这些初始状态传递到第一个`body`上每个任务的调用。These initial states are passed to the first `body` invocations on each task. 然后，每个后续的正文调用返回传递到下一步的正文调用一个可能已修改值。Then, every subsequent body invocation returns a possibly modified state value that is passed to the next body invocation. 最后，在每个任务的最后一个正文调用返回传递到的州值`localFinally`委托。Finally, the last body invocation on each task returns a state value that is passed to the `localFinally` delegate. `localFinally`每线程来对每个任务的本地状态执行一个最终操作一次调用委托。The `localFinally` delegate is invoked once per thread to perform a final action on each task’s local state. 此委托可能会并行调用多个任务;因此，你必须同步对任何共享的变量的访问。This delegate might be invoked concurrently on multiple tasks; therefore, you must synchronize access to any shared variables. 方法可以作为现有任务完成其执行生存期内使用多于线程数更多的任务，并替换为新的任务。The method may use more tasks than threads over the lifetime of its execution, as existing tasks complete and are replaced by new tasks. 这样，基础对象有机会添加、 更改或删除服务循环的线程。This gives the underlying object the chance to add, change, or remove threads that service the loop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于并行可能执行的操作，一组。This method can be used to execute a set of operations, potentially in parallel. 有关在操作执行或它们是否并行执行的顺序不作任何保证。No guarantees are made about the order in which the operations execute or whether they execute in parallel. 此方法不返回之前的每个提供的操作已完成，无论是否完成由于正常或异常终止。This method does not return until each of the provided operations has completed, regardless of whether completion occurs due to normal or exceptional termination. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用 Parallel.Invoke 执行并行操作](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-use-parallel-invoke-to-execute-parallel-operations.md)。For more information, see [How to: Use Parallel.Invoke to Execute Parallel Operations](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-use-parallel-invoke-to-execute-parallel-operations.md). ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用与其他方法、 匿名委托和 lambda 表达式的方法。This example demonstrates how to use the method with other methods, anonymous delegates, and lambda expressions. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可以用于并行可能执行的操作，一组。This method can be used to execute a set of operations, potentially in parallel. 使用取消标记传递结构允许调用方取消整个操作。The cancellation token passed in with the structure enables the caller to cancel the entire operation. 有关详细信息，请参阅[托管线程中的取消](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md)。For more information, see [Cancellation in Managed Threads](~/docs/standard/threading/cancellation-in-managed-threads.md). 有关在操作执行或它们是否并行执行的顺序不作任何保证。No guarantees are made about the order in which the operations execute or whether they execute in parallel. 此方法不返回之前的每个提供的操作已完成，无论是否完成由于正常或异常终止。This method does not return until each of the provided operations has completed, regardless of whether completion occurs due to normal or exceptional termination. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用 Parallel.Invoke 执行并行操作](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-use-parallel-invoke-to-execute-parallel-operations.md)。For more information, see [How to: Use Parallel.Invoke to Execute Parallel Operations](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-use-parallel-invoke-to-execute-parallel-operations.md).
